MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD11 postcode area of Duns. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:58pm. Our emergency response team have arrived at the Winterfield Gardens substation the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:30pm on Saturday, 20 February 2021
